mapper.select: select * from article where status = #{status} and title like concat('%',#{title},'%') order by create_time desc create_time asc pv desc limit #{page.limit}, #{page.pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into article(title, content, content_md, category_id, status, pv, preface, create_time, update_time) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{contentMd}, #{categoryId}, #{status}, #{pv}, #{preface}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update article set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, content_md = #{contentMd}, category_id = #{categoryId}, preface = #{preface}, status = #{status}, status = #{pv}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
